attributes.action: Scrap The New Forest National Park Authority
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The New Forest National Park Authority is a Quango without a purpose. It was created in the face of opposition by everyone who was consulted. It does nothing that was not already being done very well by the Verderers, Forestry Commission and the excellent District Council.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap The New Forest National Park Authority."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18346


Prime Minister's Office
